price: 69. Is it you who cause it from the rain-clouds to come down, or are We the Causer of it to come down?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: a-antum anzaltumūhu mina al-muz'ni am naḥnu al-munzilūna
